TopicTitle: (KOS) Cannot get or set field listed by :allfields in part module

Articles.Content:
I am using:

KSP 1.12.3

ModularLaunchPads 2.5.3

kOS 1:1.3.2.0

RP-1 1.12.13.0

I am trying to access the "value" field in the "refuelingpump" module, which was listed by :allfields, but it says it cannot find the field.

Here is my code: 

set vessel to SHIP.
set lbase to vessel:PARTSTAGGED("launchbase")[0].
set fuelpump to LBASE:GETMODULE("REFUELINGPUMP").
print fuelpump:allfields.
fuelpump:setfield("value", true).

It says: An attempt was made to retrieve a FIELD called value from an object of type PartModuleFields but it doesn't exist.

If this is a mod compatibility issue, tell me what mod versions I need to use.

Thanks

Edited December 10, 2022 by OMGer
I always find the problem after I post it here and get no response. Turns out I needed to be using ALLFIELDNAMES instead of ALLFIELDS.
